scenes.title: Shrouded Streets
scenes.text: Crooked docks, veiled lanterns. Conversations halt as you pass.

choices.label: Talk to Inga (paranoia)
choices.text: Inga glances over her shoulder, voice barely above a whisper: 'Not safe to speak here.'

choices.label: Coax Inga to speak plainly (poise ≥2)
choices.text: She hesitates, then mutters: 'The chief’s advisors twist every tale.'

choices.label: Watch Inga (keen insight ≥2)
choices.text: You notice her eyes flick to the scribe’s window before she answers.

choices.label: Buy a drink; talk to Kjell (poise ≥2)
choices.text: Kjell grunts, unimpressed: 'Words are cheap. Silver talks.'

choices.label: Eavesdrop (keen insight ≥2)
choices.text: You catch a muttered phrase: 'Conqueror’s silver stains every hand.'

choices.label: Give Solveig 1 coin (loyal chief, bad court)
choices.text: Solveig’s blind eyes fix on you: 'Loyalty’s a curse in this hall.'

scenes.title: Hall of Whispers
scenes.text: Hushed chamber; tapestries swallow sound. Chief Ulfrik’s gaze is knife-sharp.

choices.label: Watch the Scribe (keen insight ≥2)
choices.text: Ragnhild's quill pauses mid-stroke as she watches the conversation.

choices.label: Talk to the Guard-Captain (clarity)
choices.text: Eirik nods approvingly: 'Plain speech serves better than riddles.'

choices.label: Trade barbs with the Courtier (poise ≥2)
choices.text: Freydis's smile sharpens: 'How refreshing—someone who speaks our language.'

choices.label: Call out a lie (keen insight ≥3) & present scroll
choices.text: You expose their deception with surgical precision. Ulfrik's respect is earned.

choices.label: Win trust (poise ≥3) & present scroll
choices.text: Your words weave through their defenses like silk through stone.

choices.label: Intimidate the court (strength ≥3) & present scroll
choices.text: Your presence fills the hall—even whispers fall silent before your authority.

choices.label: Withhold the scroll (leave safely)
choices.text: You keep your secrets close and make diplomatic farewells.

scenes.title: Into the Mist
scenes.text: The streets watch you as you return to the pier.

choices.label: Choose the next isle
choices.text: The mist parts as you chart course for another isle.

choices.label: Sail home (Convergence)
choices.text: With allies secured, you turn toward home and the final confrontation.
